name: Mirror Minute
description:
Stand on or hit the objects not reflected in the mirror to score!

Use arrow keys + space to move.

Made for Trijam 155 - Gameplay under 1 minute!

If I had a bit more time I probably would have worked on animations, particles, and improving the randomisation system.

Made in just under 3 hours thanks to using some pre-made assets:

Music - Castle Of Fear by David Renda www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Sounds - Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection by Juhani Junkala - https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Sprites - Pixel Platformer (1.1) by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

font - Dotty by Kevin Richey - https://www.1001fonts.com/dotty-font.html
